subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The police in Tucson shot pepper spray at several hundred fans who took to the streets and threw beer bottles and firecrackers at officers Saturday night after Arizona’s overtime loss to Wisconsin in the men’s N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: The police in Tucson shot pepper spray at several hundred fans who took to the streets and threw beer bottles and firecrackers at officers Saturday night after Arizona’s overtime loss to Wisconsin in the men’s N.C.A.A. tournament.
